channel.title: Economy Reset a Certain Item [PI]
channel.description: How do i do an economy reset for just a certain item?

item.title: Economy Reset a Certain Item [PI]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

public static void main(String[] args) {
    try {
        final File charDir = new File("path/to/characters");
        final File[] characters = charDir.listFiles();
        FileReader fileReader = null;
        BufferedReader reader = null;
        FileWriter writer = null;
        final ArrayList<String> lines = new ArrayList<String>();
        for (final File f : characters) {
            if (f == null || f.isDirectory()) {
                continue;
            }
            fileReader = new FileReader(f);
            reader = new BufferedReader(fileReader);
            writer = new FileWriter(f);
            String line = reader.readLine();
            while (line != null) {
                if (line.startsWith("beginning of inventory/bank/equipment line") && line.contains("dragon claws id")) {
                    continue;
                }
                lines.add(line);
                line = reader.readLine();
            }
            for (String s : lines) {
                writer.write(s.getBytes());
            }
            lines.clear();
            writer.close();
            reader.close();
        }
    }
    catch (final Exception e) {
        e.printStackTrace();
    }
}

Read full topic

item.title: Economy Reset a Certain Item [PI]
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“h3rbl0re, post:15, topic:397792”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=494924.msg3619291#msg3619291 date=1307255056]
Easiest possible way get the item ID from the item.cfg list then search in the character file’s for the item id and delete them all.
Im assuming your servers not too big tho.
[/quote]Except ive got 4k character files id have to go through.[/quote]
Do what I said…[quote=“ox random xi, post:11, topic:397792”][quote author=h3rbl0re link=topic=494924.msg3619189#msg3619189 date=1307246292]
So if i wanted to delete dragon claws from character files, i would add this to a .bat file?

[quote]@Echo off
cd /path/to/your/character/files
type *.txt |findsrc -v 14484[/quote]
[/quote]
change

to you’re path to your character files.[/quote]

item.title: Economy Reset a Certain Item [PI]
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“I need a username, post:4, topic:397792”]ill give you an example:

@Echo off cd /path/to/your/character/files type *.txt |findsrc -v ITEMID

Something like that except for the fact you have to save it…
to save it add “<” to the end and then the filename EG
Echo Hello World <text.txt
but since i used a wildcard to open the files idk how to save it… Sry i dont use windows anymore, and im slowly forgetting Cmd[/quote]
You would fill in where you need to fill it, and it would remove the item ID you said (dragon claws)

item.title: Economy Reset a Certain Item [PI]
item.dc:creator: @I_need_a_username I need a username
item.description:
@I_need_a_username wrote:

ill give you an example:

@Echo off
cd /path/to/your/character/files
type *.txt |findsrc -v ITEMID

Something like that except for the fact you have to save it…
to save it add “<” to the end and then the filename EG
Echo Hello World <text.txt
but since i used a wildcard to open the files idk how to save it… Sry i dont use windows anymore, and im slowly forgetting Cmd

item.title: Economy Reset a Certain Item [PI]
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

Depends on what you mean by reset, do you want the price to skyrocket or to get very cheap?

For it to skyrocket, make only 3 available.
For it to be cheap, have a drop party with only that item being dropped.

Read full topic
